alert.note: Alert for Durham; Franklin; Granville; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 3:44PM EDT until March 31 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Granville County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Wake County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Durham County in central North Carolina... West central Franklin County in central North Carolina... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 343 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cary, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Creedmoor, Wake Forest, Franklinton, RDU International, Apex, Morrisville and Youngsville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
